source.name: IBRD Statement of Loans - Latest Available Snapshot
source.description: The International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) loans are public and publicly guaranteed debt extended by the World Bank Group. IBRD loans are made to, or guaranteed by, countries that are members of IBRD. IBRD may also make loans to IFC. IBRD lends at market rates. Data are in U.S. dollars calculated using historical rates. This dataset contains the latest available snapshot of the Statement of Loans. The World Bank complies with all sanctions applicable to World Bank transactions.

datasets.name: Argentina Projects 1
datasets.description: The International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) loans are public and publicly guaranteed debt extended by the World Bank Group. IBRD loans are made to, or guaranteed by, countries that are members of IBRD. IBRD may also make loans to IFC. IBRD lends at market rates. Data are in U.S. dollars calculated using historical rates. datasets.name: IBRD: Summary of Current Loans for Colombia
datasets.description: Summary lending data comprising total approved, disbursed and undisbursed amounts together with borrower obligation (outstanding & overdue amounts) of all current IBRD loans as of the date indicated. Amounts are rounded to billions of US$ equivalent converted as of the date indicated. Current loans include loans that have not been fully repaid, terminated or cancelled.

datasets.name: IBRD Active Loans: Disbursed and Undisbursed for Regions
datasets.description: The International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) loans are public and publicly guaranteed debt extended by the World Bank Group. IBRD loans are made to, or guaranteed by, countries that are members of IBRD. IBRD lends at market rates. Active loans include loans that have not been fully repaid, terminated, or cancelled. This dataset contains the latest available snapshot of the Statement of Loans. Amounts are in USD equivalent using the exchange rates available as of the date of the statement.
